patthana1.23:152.1: Sanidassanasappaṭigho ca anidassanaappaṭigho ca dhammā anidassanaappaṭighassa dhammassa purejātaṁ.
patthana1.23:153.1: Anidassanasappaṭigho ca anidassanaappaṭigho ca dhammā sanidassanasappaṭighassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.23:154.1: Anidassanasappaṭigho ca anidassanaappaṭigho ca dhammā anidassanasappaṭighassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.23:155.1: Anidassanasappaṭigho ca anidassanaappaṭigho ca dhammā anidassanaappaṭighassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana1.23:156.1: Anidassanasappaṭigho ca anidassanaappaṭigho ca dhammā sanidassanasappaṭighassa ca anidassanaappaṭighassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.23:157.1: Anidassanasappaṭigho ca anidassanaappaṭigho ca dhammā anidassanasappaṭighassa ca anidassanaappaṭighassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.23:158.1: Anidassanasappaṭigho ca anidassanaappaṭigho ca dhammā sanidassanasappaṭighassa ca anidassanasappaṭighassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.23:159.1: Anidassanasappaṭigho ca anidassanaappaṭigho ca dhammā sanidassanasappaṭighassa ca anidassanasappaṭighassa ca anidassanaappaṭighassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.23:160.1: Sanidassanasappaṭigho ca anidassanasappaṭigho ca dhammā anidassanaappaṭighassa dhammassa purejātaṁ.
patthana1.23:161.1: Sanidassanasappaṭigho ca anidassanasappaṭigho ca anidassanaappaṭigho ca dhammā anidassanaappaṭighassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.23:162.1_0: Nahetuyā pañcavīsa, naārammaṇe dvāvīsa, naadhipatiyā pañcavīsa, naanantare pañcavīsa,
patthana1.23:162.1_1: nasamanantare pañcavīsa, nasahajāte dvādasa, naaññamaññe catuvīsa, nanissaye nava,
patthana1.23:162.1_2: naupanissaye pañcavīsa, napurejāte bāvīsa, napacchājāte pañcavīsa, naāsevane pañcavīsa,
patthana1.23:162.1_3: nakamme pañcavīsa, navipāke catuvīsa, naāhāre pañcavīsa, naindriye tevīsa, najhāne
patthana1.23:162.1_4: pañcavīsa, namagge pañcavīsa, nasampayutte catuvīsa, navippayutte bāvīsa, noatthiyā
patthana1.23:162.1_5: nava, nonatthiyā pañcavīsa, novigate pañcavīsa, noavigate nava.
patthana1.23:164.1_0: Nahetupaccayā naārammaṇapaccayā naadhipatiyā bāvīsa, naanantare bāvīsa, nasamanantare
patthana1.23:164.1_1: bāvīsa, nasahajāte nava, naaññamaññe bāvīsa, nanissaye nava, naupanissaye ekavīsa,
patthana1.23:164.1_2: napurejāte bāvīsa, napacchājāte bāvīsa …pe… nasampayutte bāvīsa, navippayutte bāvīsa,
patthana1.23:164.1_3: noatthiyā nava, nonatthiyā bāvīsa, novigate bāvīsa, noavigate nava. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.23:166.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare satta, nasamanantare
patthana1.23:166.1_1: satta, naaññamaññe satta, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte satta
patthana1.23:166.1_2: …pe… nasampayutte satta, navippayutte ekaṁ, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta.
patthana1.23:167.1_0: Hetu sahajāta nissaya atthi avigatanti naārammaṇe satta …pe… naanantare satta, nasamanantare
patthana1.23:167.1_1: satta, naaññamaññe satta (idhāpi saṅkhittaṁ), nasampayutte satta, navippayutte ekaṁ,
patthana1.23:168.1: Hetu sahajāta aññamañña nissaya atthi avigatanti naārammaṇe ekaṁ (sabbattha ekaṁ), novigate ekaṁ. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.23:170.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā nava, anantare ekaṁ, samanantare ekaṁ, sahajāte
patthana1.23:170.1_1: ekavīsa, aññamaññe cha, nissaye ekavīsa, upanissaye tīṇi, purejāte cha, pacchājāte
patthana1.23:170.1_2: satta, āsevane ekaṁ, kamme satta, vipāke satta, āhāre satta, indriye nava, jhāne
patthana1.23:170.1_3: satta, magge satta, sampayutte ekaṁ, vippayutte aṭṭha, atthiyā pañcavīsa, natthiyā
patthana1.23:170.1_4: ekaṁ, vigate ekaṁ, avigate pañcavīsa. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
